[[File:TOWJoey'sInterview.png|thumb|The interviewer played by [[Sasha Alexander]]]]
'''The Interviewer''' was portrayed by [[Sasha Alexander]] in "[[The One With Joey's Interview]]".

A journalist from the magazine ''Soap Opera Digest'' interviews [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] about the return of his role as [[Dr. Drake Ramoray]].   The interview goes well,  thanks to the intervention of his friends,  until the end when he makes an unwise comment.  Joey later reveals that she won't print the last bit after he slept with her.
